original_definition: 'cogeneration' means simultaneous generation in one process of thermal energy and electrical and/or mechanical energy;
generated_definition: 'cogeneration' means the simultaneous generation of electricity and heat from a single fuel source, such as a gas engine or biomass burner, through the use of a heat recovery system.
